name: Circuit-X
description: Circuit-X is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES Club. With its classic box design and a vibrant redBlack screen, Circuit-X is a formidable member of the club. Equipped with foundry arms and legs, it combines durability and strength to handle any task at hand. Its helmet addon enhances its abilities and provides advanced functionalities. Circuit-X is an expert in analyzing electronic signals and possesses a high level of intelligence. It is always ready to assist its fellow club members in their web-based endeavors.
